snippet.title: Detectives United: Beyond Time Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Elephant Games, the studio that brought you the exhilarating Mystery Trackers series, returns with a new out-of-this-world case for the Detectives United team! 

They say that good things come in small packages, but can one simple delivery determine the fate of the world? That’s what you and your fellow agents are about the find out! When a mysterious parcel sent through time arrives at your agency, you quickly find yourself in a race against the clock to save all of humanity! An otherworldly entity is rising, set to destroy your world. Can you and the team defy the odds and stop a cosmic catastrophe before it’s too late? Find out in this stellar Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

Download the trial for your desktop!
https://www.bigfishgames.com/us/en/pc-games.html

Available for Game Club members on May 11th, 2023.
